meaningMnemonic: Remember how you learned that 死刑 means "death penalty?" Well a <kanji>criminal</kanji> who has been sentenced to it is a <vocabulary>condemned criminal</vocabulary> or a <vocabulary>death row convict</vocabulary>. They're condemned to death.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
